titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for a waiver of minimum required distribution rules applicable to pension plans for 2013 and 2014.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/18/2013--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to waive minimum distribution requirements for tax-exempt retirement plans for calendar years 2013 and 2014.
